item.description:
Have you ever been to a Murder Mystery Party? It's a blast! This will be our fifth party. Ask anyone who may have attended one before and they will tell you they had a great time! We will be having the the Murder Mystery party at the Scenic theater,

This murder mystery game is not a board game; everyone will be participating at the same time; you must not be afraid of the dark, and you must dress all in black clothing! This is not a show. We will be in a big old scary theater with two or three large rooms; plenty of space to wander around in and hide victims!
At 6 pm we'll have dinner, I will explain the game and give a brief tour of the theater. At 7pm the murder mystery will start. This is not a child event so please do not bring your children.

I will buy food, appetizers, drinks, condiments, cutlery and plates. Hotdogs, BBQ chicken, wraps, salads, mixed fruit, chips, dip, watermelon and deserts too. I'll keep the costs low at $15 per person. (To be paid in person at this event) Iâ€™ll bring a cooler with ice, too. If others want to bring some ice and coolers that would be great, too.

I am not doing a potluck because we all know that a few members usually don't show up and don't bring the food they've signed up for. Potlucks usually end up with alot of desserts and less varieties of food. As I have planned this event, there will be a greater diversity and balance of food, with less pressure on members having to figure out what to bring. I will need help setting up, cooking and cleaning up afterwards so please let me know if you'd like to volunteer: I'll need:

2 setup volunteers to show up at 5 PM

3 clean-up volunteers to clear away dinner.

Please attend only if you are willing to actively participate. This is not a spectator event, be aware this event is played in nearly dark rooms.

There is plenty of free parking in the area.

The Scenic Theater is on main street across from Citizens Bank.
More details will follow as we get closer to the event.

If you have any questions call me (Peter) at 603-312-6735.

See you there for a memorable night!

Peter
item.name: Murder Mystery Party/ Dinner
